channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TJ Maxx parent says holiday shopping is off to a 'strong start,' but its guidance tells another story
item.description: TJX Cos. is continuing to grow sales as competitors like Target and Macy's struggle to win over shoppers.

item.title: Hungarian Forint Is Likely to Stay Weak Amid Risk Aversion
item.description: The Hungarian forint is likely to remain under pressure for some time due to risk aversion related to global uncertainties, ING analyst Frantisek Tabo...

item.title: Walmart hikes its outlook again as shoppers spend more outside the grocery aisles
item.description: The discounter will deliver its latest sales results as inflation cools and the holiday season heats up.

item.title: Nvidia to report third-quarter earnings after the bell
item.description: In August, Nvidia said it expected about "several billion" in Blackwell sales during the January quarter.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Increase Amid Higher Imports
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories rose last week as an increase in imports offset a decline in production, while refineries ran at a lower rate than the week...

item.title: Walmart and Target: A Tale of Two Retailers
item.description: Is Walmart a bellwether for other retailers or the Grinch that will steal Christmas from everyone else?

item.title: Dow Edges Up as Nvidia Earnings Loom
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 edged lower while the Dow industrials were roughly flat.

item.title: Short-Covering Pushes U.S. Natural Gas Futures Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were up and on track to settle above the key $3 level amid forecasts of cold weather, which have prompted a short-covering bu...

item.title: Target shares plunge 20% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years
item.description: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shop...

item.title: Lowe's beats on earnings and hikes guidance, but still expects sales to fall this year
item.description: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.
